resources.string: Jigme Dorji Wangchuck National Refferal Hospital,Thimphu.

The JDWNRH is the main hospital in Bhutan, located in the capital of Bhutan, Thimphu. It was established in 1972, and provides free basic medical treatment as well as advanced surgeries and emergency services to citizens from all over the country.It provides the most sophisticated health evaluation and management services in the country.

This Android App FindADoctor is to check the availibility of doctors in the hospital especially in the JDWNRH. This App provides platform to avail the services facilitated by doctors and their availibility in the hospital if users has installed this app.
